title: How TVA is utilizing DERMS to handle unprecedented load growth, with Joseph R. Johnson
description: Joseph R. Johnson of Tennessee Valley Authority discussed partnerships with tech giants at the 2025 OATI Energy Conference to enhance demand response solutions.
content: Joseph R. Johnson of Tennessee Valley Authority discussed partnerships with tech giants at the 2025 OATI Energy Conference to enhance demand response solutions.
